              indeed
              ,
               
              sir
              .

speaker: SLENDER
text:
That’s
               
              meat
               
              and
               
              drink
               
              to
               
              me
              ,
               
              now
              .
               
              I
               
              have
              
              seen
               
              Sackerson
               
              loose
               
              twenty
               
              times
              ,
               
              and
               
              have
               
              taken
              
              him
               
              by
               
              the
               
              chain
              .
               
              But
              ,
               
              I
               
              warrant
               
              you
              ,
               
              the
               
              women
              
              have
               
              so
               
              cried
               
              and
               
              shrieked
               
              at
               
              it
               
              that
               
              it
               
              passed
              .
               
              But
              
              women
              ,
               
              indeed
              ,
               
              cannot
               
              abide
               
              ’em
              ;
               
              they
               
              are
               
              very
               
              ill-favored
              
              rough
               
              things
              .

speaker: PAGE
text:
Come
              ,
               
              gentle
               
              Master
               
              Slender
              ,
               
              come
              .
               
              We
               
              stay
               
              for
              
              you
              .

speaker: SLENDER
text:
I’ll
               
              eat
               
              nothing
              ,
               
              I
               
              thank
               
              you
              ,
               
              sir
              .

speaker: PAGE
text:
By
               
              cock
               
              and
               
              pie
              ,
               
              you
               
              shall
               
              not
               
              choose
              ,
               
              sir
              !
               
              Come
              ,
              
              come
              .

speaker: SLENDER
text:
Nay
              ,
               
              pray
               
              you
              ,
               
              lead
               
              the
               
              way
              .

speaker: PAGE
text:
Come
               
              on
              ,
               
              sir
              .

speaker: SLENDER
text:
Mistress
               
              Anne
              ,
               
              yourself
               
              shall
               
              go
               
              first
              .

speaker: ANNE
text:
Not
               
              I
              ,
               
              sir
              .
               
              Pray
               
              you
              ,
               
              keep
               
              on
              .

speaker: SLENDER
text:
Truly
              ,
               
              I
               
              will
               
              not
               
              go
               
              first
              ,
               
              truly
              ,
               
              la
              !
               
              I
               
              will
               
              not
               
              do
              
              you
               
              that
               
              wrong
              .

speaker: ANNE
text:
I
               
              pray
               
              you
              ,
               
              sir
              .

speaker: SLENDER
text:
I’ll
               
              rather
               
              be
               
              unmannerly
               
              than
               
              troublesome
              .
              
              You
               
              do
               
              yourself
               
              wrong
              ,
               
              indeed
              ,
               
              la
              !
